Title: Sterling Scholar of Computer Technology
Subtitle: The American International School of Utah
Description Brief: Chosen as the Computer Technology Sterling Scholar representative for my school for my work in robotics and personal projects and was selected for regionals.

Title: Minecraft for Dummies
Description Brief: Published a book on Minecraft that was sold on Amazon and other retailers. The book was a guide for new players to learn the game.

Title: Minecraft Recipes for Dummies
Description Brief: Devised, wrote, and obtained pictures for this book, a part of the for Dummies portable series, giving a reference guide to the various recipes in the hit game Minecraft
